hotCoreAuth Class

Defined in: hotplate/node_modules/hotCoreAuth/lib/hotCoreAuth.js:21
Module: hotCoreAuth

Provides authentication abilities to Hotplate

This module's goal is to do two things.

First of all , it defines all of the stores necessary for authentication. The stores in question are:

  • Users. The list of users.
  • UserStrategies. The list of strategies set bu that user.
  • AuthStrategies. The complete list of auth strategies available
  • UserLogins. A store that simply allows the search of username, used by Ajax to check if a username is already taken
  • Index
  • Hooks

Item Index

Hooks

  • init
  • run

Hooks

init

Defined in hotplate/node_modules/hotCoreAuth/lib/hotCoreAuth.js:48

Initialisation hook. It creates the basic authentication stores (Users, UserStrategies, AuthStrategies, UserLogins)

run

Defined in hotplate/node_modules/hotCoreAuth/lib/hotCoreAuth.js:288

Sets recover URL /recover/:recoverToken (for token recovery).
Also goes through the list of AuthStrategies, loads the right files in auth/{strategy name}.js (e.g. hotCoreAuth.facebook), and runs them. This basically ensures that all strategies have the right URLs all set for them to work.
